verses.text_plain: O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land, where no water is;
verses.verse_html:
1O God, thou art my God; early will I seek thee: my soul thirsteth for thee, my flesh longeth for thee in a dry and thirsty land, where no water is; ▼
▼ thirsty: Heb. weary
 , ▼
▼ where…: without water

tokens.definition: אֱלֹהִים ʼĕlôhîym, el-o-heem'; plural of H433 ; gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative:—angels, × exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), × (very) great, judges, × mighty.

tokens.definition: שָׁחַר shâchar, shaw-khar'; a primitive root; properly, to dawn, i.e. (figuratively) be (up) early at any task (with the implication of earnestness); by extension, to search for (with painstaking):—(do something) betimes, enquire early, rise (seek) betimes, seek diligently) early, in the morning).

verses.text_plain: To see thy power and thy glory, so as I have seen thee in the sanctuary.

tokens.definition: הָלַל hâlal, haw-lal'; a primitive root; to be clear (orig. of sound, but usually of color); to shine; hence, to make a show, to boast; and thus to be (clamorously) foolish; to rave; causatively, to celebrate; also to stultify:—(make) boast (self), celebrate, commend, (deal, make), fool(-ish, -ly), glory, give (light), be (make, feign self) mad (against), give in marriage, (sing, be worthy of) praise, rage, renowned, shine.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: praise (117x), glory (14x), boast (10x), mad (8x), shine (3x), foolish (3x), fools (2x), commended (2x), rage (2x), celebrate (1x), give (1x), marriage (1x), renowned (1x).
outline: to shine (Qal) to shine (fig. of God's favour) (Hiphil) to flash forth light

tokens.definition: פֶּה peh, peh; from H6284 ; the mouth (as the means of blowing), whether literal or figurative (particularly speech); specifically edge, portion or side; adverbially (with preposition) according to:—accord(-ing as, -ing to), after, appointment, assent, collar, command(-ment), × eat, edge, end, entry, file, hole, × in, mind, mouth, part, portion, × (should) say(-ing), sentence, skirt, sound, speech, × spoken, talk, tenor, × to, two-edged, wish, word.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: mouth (340x), commandment (37x), edge (35x), according (22x), word (15x), hole (6x), end (3x), appointment (2x), portion (2x), tenor (2x), sentence (2x), miscellaneous (32x).
outline: (peh) mouth mouth (of man) mouth (as organ of speech) mouth (of animals) mouth, opening, orifice (of a well, river, etc) extremity, end
mouth, opening, orifice (of a well, river, etc)
(pim) a weight equal to one third of a shekel, occurs only in 1 Sa. 13:: 21

tokens.definition: דָבַר dâbar, daw-bar'; a primitive root; perhaps properly, to arrange; but used figuratively (of words), to speak; rarely (in a destructive sense) to subdue:—answer, appoint, bid, command, commune, declare, destroy, give, name, promise, pronounce, rehearse, say, speak, be spokesman, subdue, talk, teach, tell, think, use (entreaties), utter, × well, × work.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: speak (840x), say (118x), talk (46x), promise (31x), tell (25x), commune (20x), pronounce (14x), utter (7x), command 4 misc (38x).
outline: to speak, declare, converse, command, promise, warn, threaten, sing (Qal) to speak (Niphal) to speak with one another, talk (Piel) to speak to promise (Pual) to be spoken (Hithpael) to speak (Hiphil) to lead away, put to flight
(Niphal) to speak with one another, talk
(Hiphil) to lead away, put to flight

tokens.definition: שֶׁקֶר sheqer, sheh'-ker; from H8266 ; an untruth; by implication, a sham (often adverbial):—without a cause, deceit(-ful), false(-hood, -ly), feignedly, liar, lie, lying, vain (thing), wrongfully.
tokens.kjv_translation_count: lie (28x), lying (21x), false (20x), falsehood (13x), falsely (13x), vain (5x), wrongfully (4x), deceitful (2x), deceit (1x), liar (1x), miscellaneous (5x).

tokens.definition: סָכַר çâkar, saw-kar'; a primitive root; to shut up; by implication, to surrender:—stop, give over. See also H5462 , H7936 .
tokens.kjv_translation_count: stopped (2x), give over (1x), impoverished .
outline: to shut up, stop up (Niphal) to be stopped, be shut up (Piel) to shut up, give over
